channel.title: Authors on Landfried
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Landfried

item.description: PhD in computer science (defense 2023) and MSc in social anthropologist, I am a Bayesian Data Scientist working on causal reasoning under uncertainty. Patience, constancy and the product rule (of probability or evolution). Patience to learn from mistakes, because only surprise is the source of information. The constancy for the long term, not to stop doing despite the mistakes. And the rule of the product is the answer, cooperate to create solutions.
